hackathon-description-text: There was a time when someone walked into store, had a chat with the store-owner and asked him which products he would recommend. The store-owner, knowing this person for years, would pull the right thing out of a shelf and turn the visitor into a happy customer. If the store-owner knew his trade really well, he would even anticipate his customers’ wishes and actively suggest something they did not know they needed - yet.
hackathon-requirements: An e-commerce application including the SPHERE.IO API and any other of the participating APIs.
hackathon-rules:
1. Start your project from scratch at the first day of the event.
 2. Work on an idea related to the topic "Personal Commerce".
 3. Include SPHERE.IO and any other of the participating APIs in your concept.
 4. Team size 1 - 5 people.
 5. Powerpoint-free zone: It’s your demo that’s relevant - leave the flashy slides to the consultants;) If it’s not fully functional (yet), just walk us through the code.
